text:
Berlin, DE - EyeEm - Data Engineer - VISA

We're looking for a Scala developer to join the data team to help us code and maintain our ETL and other data applications. Serious experience on the JVM or with other functional languages are acceptable substitutes for Scala skills.

Here's the requisition: https://eyeem.bamboohr.co.uk/jobs/view.php?id=21

And our careers page for more about us: http://www.eyeem.com/careers

Questions? Say hello to me at eric at eyeem.com
